pullRequest.title: Addition of a new AmmoType equals method that only compares AmmoType …

commit.message:
Addition of a new AmmoType equals method that only compares AmmoType and not rack size.
This fixes MekHQ issue 1665.
Fix a logic bug that allowed non same ammo type weapons to be reloaded with the wrong ammo

nodes.bodyText: This could be done through a ternary instead to cut down on near identical code (image is because I wasn't sure if it would work or not). Thoughts?

commit.message:
Apply suggestions from code review

Co-authored-by: Justin Bowen <39067288+Windchild292@users.noreply.github.com>
